verses.verse: In the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity<s%>, in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5221>smitten<s%>, in the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was upon <S%H935>me<s%>, and he brought me thither.

In the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> he me into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5117>set<s%> me down upon a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, whereon was as it were the <S%H4011>frame<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%>.

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H376>thither<s%>; and, behold, there was a man, whose <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, with a <S%H6616>line<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>; and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7200>behold<s%> with thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with thine <S%H241>ears<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> upon all that I shall <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H4616>thee<s%>; for, to the intent that I may <S%H7200>show<s%> them unto <S%H935>thee<s%>, art thou brought <S%H5046>hither<s%>: declare all that thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H2346><s%>, behold, a wall on the <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and in the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H520>long<s%>, of a cubit and a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H4058>each<s%>: so he measured the <S%H2948>thickness<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>; and the <S%H6967>height<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> he unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> which <S%H6440>looketh<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H4609>steps<s%> <S%H4058>thereof<s%>: and he measured the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>; and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5592>threshold<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>.

And every <S%H8372>lodge<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>; and the space between the <S%H8372>lodges<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>toward<s%> the house was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> also the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>toward<s%> the <S%H259>house<s%>, one <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

Then <S%H4058>measured<s%> he the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H8147>thereof<s%>, two <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was toward the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H8372>lodges<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>eastward<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> on this <S%H6311>side<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that <S%H6311>side<s%>; they <S%H7969>three<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%>: and the <S%H352>posts<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> measure on this side and on that <S%H4060>side<s%>.

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>opening<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>;

and a <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8372>lodges<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> on this <S%H1366>side<s%>, and a border, one <S%H520>cubit<s%> on that <S%H8372>side<s%>; and the lodges, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on this <S%H8337>side<s%>, and six cubits on that <S%H520>side<s%>.

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> from the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of the one <S%H8372>lodge<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of the <S%H7341>other<s%>, a breadth of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; <S%H6607>door<s%> against <S%H6607>door<s%>.
He <S%H6213>made<s%> also <S%H352>posts<s%>, <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H2691>court<s%> reached unto the <S%H352>posts<s%>, round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And from the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> at the <S%H2978>entrance<s%> unto the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And there were <S%H331>closed<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> to the <S%H8372>lodges<s%>, and to their <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and likewise to the <S%H361>arches<s%>; and <S%H2474>windows<s%> were round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6441>inward<s%>; and upon each <S%H352>post<s%> were <S%H8561>palm-trees<s%>.

Then <S%H935>brought<s%> he me into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>; <S%H3957>and<s%>, lo, there were chambers and a <S%H7531>pavement<s%>, <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>: <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were upon the <S%H7531>pavement<s%>.

And the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> was by the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, <S%H5980>answerable<s%> unto the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, even the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H7531>pavement<s%>.

Then he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> from the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> unto the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, both on the <S%H6921>east<s%> and on the <S%H6828>north<s%>.

And the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>, he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof and the breadth <S%H7341>thereof<s%>.

And the <S%H8372>lodges<s%> thereof were <S%H7969>three<s%> on this side and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that <S%H352>side<s%>; and the posts thereof and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were after the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>: the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And the <S%H2474>windows<s%> <S%H361>thereof<s%>, and the arches <S%H8561>thereof<s%>, and the palm-trees <S%H4060>thereof<s%>, were after the measure of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>; and they went <S%H5927>up<s%> unto it by <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>; and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

And there was a <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> over against the other <S%H8179>gate<s%>, both on the <S%H6828>north<s%> and on the <S%H6921>east<s%>; and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And he <S%H3212>led<s%> me <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%>; <S%H8179>and<s%>, behold, a gate <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%>: and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof and the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof according to these <S%H4060>measures<s%>.

And there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> in it and in the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>, like those <S%H2474>windows<s%>: the <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And there were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> to go <S%H5930>up<s%> to <S%H361>it<s%>, and the arches thereof were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8561>them<s%>; and it had palm-trees, <S%H259>one<s%> on this <S%H259>side<s%>, and another on that <S%H352>side<s%>, upon the posts thereof.

And there was a <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%>: and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> by the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>: and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to these <S%H4060>measures<s%>;

and the <S%H8372>lodges<s%> <S%H352>thereof<s%>, and the posts <S%H361>thereof<s%>, and the arches <S%H4060>thereof<s%>, according to these measures: and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> in it and in the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>; it was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>.
And there were <S%H361>arches<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>.

And the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were toward the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>; and <S%H8561>palm-trees<s%> were upon the <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H4608>thereof<s%>: and the ascent to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>.

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>: and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to these <S%H4060>measures<s%>;

and the <S%H8372>lodges<s%> <S%H352>thereof<s%>, and the posts <S%H361>thereof<s%>, and the arches <S%H4060>thereof<s%>, according to these measures: and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> therein and in the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>; it was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>.

And the <S%H361>arches<s%> thereof were toward the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>; and <S%H8561>palm-trees<s%> were upon the <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H4608>thereof<s%>, on this side, and on that side: and the ascent to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>.
And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>: and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> it according to these <S%H4060>measures<s%>;

the <S%H8372>lodges<s%> <S%H352>thereof<s%>, the posts <S%H361>thereof<s%>, and the arches <S%H2474>thereof<s%>: and there were windows therein round <S%H5439>about<s%>; the <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And the <S%H352>posts<s%> thereof were toward the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>; and <S%H8561>palm-trees<s%> were upon the <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H4608>thereof<s%>, on this side, and on that side: and the ascent to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>.
And a <S%H3957>chamber<s%> with the <S%H6607>door<s%> thereof was by the <S%H352>posts<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%>; there they <S%H1740>washed<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>.

And in the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on this <S%H7979>side<s%>, and two tables on that <S%H7819>side<s%>, to slay thereon the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> and the <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%>.

And on the one <S%H3802>side<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>, as one goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>, were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%>; and on the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%>, which belonged to the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%>.

Four <S%H702><s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> were on this <S%H702>side<s%>, and four <S%H7979>tables<s%> on that <S%H3802>side<s%>, by the side of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>; <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%>, whereupon they slew the <S%H7819>sacrifices<s%>.

And there were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, of <S%H1496>hewn<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H1363>high<s%>; whereupon they <S%H3240>laid<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> wherewith they <S%H7819>slew<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.

And the <S%H8240>hooks<s%>, <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H3559>long<s%>, were fastened <S%H1004>within<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>: and upon the <S%H7979>tables<s%> was the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H7133>oblation<s%>.

And <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H3957>chambers<s%> for the <S%H7891>singers<s%> in the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, which was at the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>; and their <S%H6440>prospect<s%> was <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%>; <S%H259>one<s%> at the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> having the <S%H6440>prospect<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>.

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H2090>me<s%>, This <S%H3957>chamber<s%>, whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%>, is for the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>;

and the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> is for the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, who from among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> come <S%H7131>near<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to minister unto <S%H8334>him<s%>.

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>, and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, <S%H7251>foursquare<s%>; and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> each <S%H352>post<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on this <S%H2568>side<s%>, and five <S%H520>cubits<s%> on that <S%H7341>side<s%>: and the breadth of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on this <S%H7969>side<s%>, and three cubits on that <S%H520>side<s%>.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; even by the <S%H4609>steps<s%> whereby they went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5982>it<s%>: and there were pillars by the <S%H352>posts<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> on this <S%H259>side<s%>, and another on that side.
